column4: does anybody know why gnomebaker ejects cd and asks me to enter cd in drive..over and over and over?
because he thinks that you didn't enter a blank cd, lot of reason (your cd is not blank or is altered, your drive don't work with this kind of cd, your drive is old ) ...
cd is blank cd-rw  drive is a couple years old but is recognised
sorry, can't help you, try with another cd
